document.full_text: american cyclist tyler hamilton has surrendered his 2004 olympic gold medal after confessing to doping, the u.s. anti-doping agency (usada) said on friday.
document.title: hamilton surrenders 2004 gold medal, usada says
lines_and_colors: american cyclist tyler hamilton has surrendered his 2004 olympic gold medal after confessing to doping, the u.s. anti-doping agency (usada) said on friday.
